text: @JGDainton If you're asking for a Refund exception, it can take a bit longer as it involves research and review.
@murphy_aw We expect to say goodbye to the MD80s in a few years. We'll share more info as soon as we have it!
@rockzimity That's very odd. What you'll want to do is contact Web Tech Support at 800-222-2377 for help.
@jamieBstewart We just checked again and it's definitely not cancelled. We'll have an update on the flight at 7p.
@SagarS_Singh That's a stunning shot! We may need to see it in person at JFK.
@zachariah__king Our counter is open at 5a in Terminal 3, Zachariah. Is your flight operated by us or BA?
@NCockrum We see you've pulled into the gate. Our apologies for the delay and glad you've made it home.
@gloriagaynor We're thrilled to have you flying with us today, Gloria. We hope your flight and vacation are #fAAntastic!
@neenjames DM your record locator, we'd love to forward your kind words.
@mona4630 We'd love a chance to take a look at what all happened. Please contact Customer Relations at the link provided.
@branderson47 Our airport team carefully applies the boarding process, Brett. We appreciate your patience.
@Quacksterup We look forward to having you on board!
@SerPancho Please DD your bag file locator and we'll be happy to take a look.
@MattMarko34 We see that you're drinking one of our favorite types of beverages in your profile pic. Receipt enough?  #cheers
@foalpapers We can wait to take you galloping across the pond! It's going to be a #GalaEpisode kind of a flight.
@MrAndyGlass We're sorry for any travel troubles and are very glad you're free as a bird now!
@TravelMan468 They'll have the most updated info and that'll save you time and some airport cardio too. Thanks for your understanding.
@foalpapers LOL. It's hard to type with hooves! Neigh to the typo. Extra nice seeing you tonight.
@andrewschulz That's not the kind of service we strive to provide and we apologize. Please follow and DM your record locator.
@mona4630 Please DM your contact info including email and mailing address so we're able to share with our specialist.
@HydeiaBroadbent We heard back from our folks in LAX and your ID hasn't been turned in yet. Did you find it by chance?
@mona4630 Have you submitted details to Customer Relations already? If so, please DM your file number.
@787MAGGIE Is that your ride tonight, Maggie? That's a #FastLittleBird
@LuisanaSuegart What's your flight number today?
@hiincyber We hear where you're coming from. Thanks for tweeting us today. We surely had a great time with you!

@Julie_McKinley Thanks for your concern, Julie. We're working with our customer directly.
@MientrasCancun We don't want you stranded. Do you need help with rebooking?
@mcclonezone We love to impress you. Thanks for flying with us, Kyle!
@carme11a Our agents to their best to judge the overhead bin space based on flight loads and may ask you to check them instead.
@loyalmaster84 Here's a helpful link that will explain how to launch TV shows: https://t.co/RcjsILm7Rc
@whitney_justine Thanks for your shout-out! We'll be sure Brandon is recognized by our Flight Service #AATeam.
@ChrisLezama We want your trips with us to be fabulous. We've forwarded all of your tweets about the Wi-Fi service to the right team.
@Turbo18psi The flight's going to depart in the morning and your connection has been rebooked. Please see an agent for assistance.
@DerekM17 We're very sorry for the extra travel time. We try to avoid delays whenever we can.
@erioapilado We're glad to hear that you're having a great time. Enjoy your ride.
@chrisreapgc We're truly sorry for the confusion. We have 3 versions of the aircraft you were on and Wi-fi is not offered on the plane.
@unbuttonmyeyes Your patience is sincerely appreciated. Our Baggage team will have it to you as soon as they can.
@jruderman Thanks for letting us know. Have you tried a different browser?
@maumarts Thank you for the additional information. We're going to reply via DM.
@Travel_laughter If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our AAdvantage Customer service team at 800-882-8880.
@flyn_ryn The gate is closed at that time to try to ensure an on-time departure. Please see the agent for rebooking help.
@Brian_Fischbach We're sorry for this hiccup. We see you're almost at your connection. We'll have you there soon.
@Saraeray We're sorry for the unusually long hold time, but our agents will be with you as quickly as possible.
@Cartee_Berry Please check your DMs for a message.
@Yi9432 It's all taken care of. You're confirmed on AA2188 at 10:20a.
@A3Queen When Mother Nature is not playing fair, she can cause interruptions in our operations. We'll have you on your way shortly.
@MichaelWTravels We're sorry for the high call volume. Please call MIA directly at 305-526-7763 or 305-526-1984. Thanks for your patience.
@SarahRobarts We're so glad you had a wonderful weekend, Sarah!
@NationwideAMC Thanks for the heads up. We've tweeted our customer directly.
@deeny_weeny We're always here to fly you to amazing places and hope you find a fare that'll work for you.

@ciclismotours You're welcome. Have a great day!

@sandyk85 Once you get the Reservations department, please ask them to transfer you to the Baggage department.
@mlinds12 We hear your frustration and we're sorry again that you didn't get the resolution you were looking for.
@tleshan We're sorry for any inconvenience. We're working on making travel smooth out of DCA.
@raghvani_pravin We're sincerely sorry you're not happy with the responses. We've forwarded all of your tweets to Customer Relations.
@Holko We hear you and always appreciate your feedback. It truly helps us understand better where changes need to be made.

@autumnsjs90 Shaun, please see Baggage Service at the airport to file a report.

@rosepatita We always want you kept in the loop and apologize for the lack of communication. We're currently awaiting the inbound flight.

@0iCeKoLd7 What's going on, Joel? What can we help you with today?

@Ed_Ref_Paula We're sorry to hear this. Do you need any help with rebooking?
@NateHayner Thanks for the DM, Nate. We'll take a look and someone will respond shortly.

@joshua_ward Thanks for your patience. Our team will gladly assist and take good care of you.
@acersaccharinum That's wonderful news! Thanks for all your patience tonight.
@DavidCherryATX You're living the life there, David! All you have to do is just sit back, relax and enjoy that ride. #dreamliner

@CustomerIsFirst Awesome! We'll be looking forward to sending it over, it's one of our favorite things to do.
@kaleenamenke We can understand why you're a fan of this song, we like it too. We'll see you on board soon.
@chibarefootguy Schedule changes can happened anytime and we're very sorry that your flight was affected.

@jaxhockey Weather is caused some delays in the DC area and as soon as it arrives, we'll have you on your way.
@polonius916 We're sorry for your frustration. Please continue working with our airport agents for rebooking assistance.

@therealcliffyb It's hundreds of planes. We're more than half-way there!
@haroliano Our apologies again for lack of a window view. We love having you on board, and thank you for your business.
@GeekyConstance Please contact AAdvantage Customer Service and they can check on that for you. https://t.co/htC3RzXfwa
@StevieTacos Are you talking about our credit card offer?
@brandibdavis We're thrilled to take you there. Have a fantastic time at the event this evening.

@theAlasunDior You know we can't quit you, Alasun. You're welcome back anytime.
@mie_watanabe So sorry for any crankiness, Mieko. We do show that you'll miss your connection and you've been rebooked on the 9:44a flight.
@Kaplanvp That concerns us. We want you to feel safe at all times. Please DM us detail info.
@teamtenacityfit When military orders change, you can change your ticket for an earlier or later flight without the change charge.
@StyleIcon421 We're sorry about the delay, sometimes mother nature only interrupts one flight course. We'll have you on the way soon.
@smt79 We'll take a look at it for you. Please DM us your record locator, Sean.
@EFLAREGENT We know missing a flight can be very frustrating. If you haven't been assisted yet, please DM us your record locator.
@bechatman We understand and respect your point of view. We wish that allowing a free checked bag would be as easy as that.
@vroseann We don't offer actual toilet seat covers on our planes. Feel free to use toilet paper or Kleenex.
@MontelleKline That's awesome! We see your trip and would like to forward to our team. Just to be sure, this was at the connecting city?
@Aboveyourmeans We're showing a refreshment is served on that flight, but not a meal.
@Thos_Reidy It saddens us to hear that. We offer fares that allow you to make changes without a change charge too. https://t.co/XRVZIdDHn2
@bcmoseley We're sorry that we've interrupted your travel plans this evening, what's your flight number?
@lainee_liu You can also call them from the UK. See here for local world wide numbers: https://t.co/htC3RzXfwa
@harriswes That's great news! We'd love to forward your high praises, Wes. Please DM us your locator and details. #AATeam
@27thhGraphics We love it too, Tatiana! #weheartNY
@HeidPack We're sincerely sorry for the delay and we really do our best to avoid them, or at least minimize them.
@teixeira_ra That's not what we want to hear, Rafael. You may send a formal message to Customer Relations: https://t.co/ShFB7JpoZL
@TheHOBOnation That doesn't sound right. What's going on?

@MateoTorr We don't have any drinks here, but our crew will take great care of you.
@andrewvaughan It will be our pleasure to forward your high praises to acknowledge them for taking great care of you, Andrew! #AATeam

@MattK_FS Our agents will work to get you on the next available flight. Thanks for your patience.
@benjaminspear We're glad to hear you made the connection. Please DM us the device manf & model, and if you have the current app version.
@Trucha50 What a lovely view. We're always happy to have you on board! Thanks for flying with us.
@RobtELee They know you're coming and will do their best. The doors close 10 minutes prior to departure.
@davidbnz We're glad you got it all sorted out. Have a great evening.
@sweetlyvoiced It appears there were weather delays earlier in DCA affecting the delay. We do see you've been rebooked for 7:20a tomorrow.
@shinbal You'll be happy to know we're adding new planes to our fleet every week. We can't wait for you to have the opportunity to fly one!
@Murdoch_F3 We want to make sure your requests are going through. Please DM record locator so we can take a peek.
@arturocondo You're worth a lot to us, Arturo, please don't feel you're not. Our crew should help with that if we have the closet room.
@JoshL29 We have a great link to assist you. Click on the App tab here: https://t.co/lkHRoCpQBw
@RanRichard We don't show any flights from PHL to CLT tonight. If your friend needs assistance please have them see an airport agent.
@AllFlashNoCash We're sorry to hear someone took your phone while charging. It's possible it was picked up by another customer.
@crowne_d We don't like delays either and we're sorry we weren't able to get you to your destination on time. Your safety is our priority.
@jeanybeann That's a bit unusual, Shana. We're sorry it took longer than expected. We'll take good care of you on your flight.
@SeanM_Thomas If you've a slight possibility that you'll miss your flight, let us know. We'll be happy to help.
@SadieRyan That's not something we want to hear. What's going on?
@HBelfatto We love you back! What's your flight number we'd be happy to give you an update.
@leejayb Being at the airport totally counts! We have enjoyed seeing you so much, we're looking forward to more adventures together.
@evelynsays We'd planned on your trip to be an easy one and we're sincerely sorry for the disruption. Our agents will help you.
@hinaruto33 Are you using the latest version? If so, then please contact our Web Tech Support team for help at 800-882-8880.
@r0m8470_Bob Our experts at AAdvantage can really dig into this. We're not seeing flights that'd work on that routing. Call 800-882-8880.
@atoughcustomer We'll have you on your way as quickly as we can.
@joelburnham Please have them check this link for special deals: https://t.co/kD783cWqId. We hope they see something that works for them.
@uttammukh We're sorry to hear you're unhappy with the resolution received. You can resubmit your request for a 2nd look.
@Syamalak If your dog is a service animal, he's welcome in the cabin, as long as he's eligible: https://t.co/dn2rMzWSs5
@ScanMyPhotos We have some of the best in the industry! Please DM your record locator and details of what happened so we can pass this on.
@pbnjamyourbutt We have reached out to her already. Thanks for your concern.
@EdwinQian There are regular training exercises in the northwest corner of the airport, Edwin.
@AmieBea73945183 That's not the impression we want you to have. We'll have more info around 4:45p. We're sorry for the long delay.
@seayfood We sense some frustration and we don't like it. What's going on?
@WhyCLE We're sorry that everyone doesn't have their bag. Once you file a report, check for updates here: https://t.co/5uvOCDjTvJ
@cr2_travel Our Customer Relations team will review your concerns and respond directly to you. They'll follow up with you soon.
@efusco That's the plan! Great seeing you again, Evan.
@nnpalmore The plane needed was delayed flying in. Thanks for your patience with us. We're glad to see that you've departed.
@WhyCLE You're right, we shouldn't ever delay baggage. We'll get them in your hands as quickly as possible.
@DrAMS622 We do offer the ability to sort results by time and fare on our website, Angela.
@wmonte We want our customers to always be informed. Please contact us for any further information. Have a great evening!
@parashupreti We don't like to delay flights if at all possible. What's your flight number and we'll check to see what's going on?
@jwithane That''s great you left a message. If the item is turned in, they'll reach out to you directly. #crossingfingers for you!
@HenryGraebe Please DM us with your record locator. We'd be happy to see what's going on.
@Shonuff_B Our goal is to always get you to where you want to go safely and on time. Thanks for flying with us today.
@kentguthrie We appreciate your flexibility today. Our baggage team will take great care of your bag for you.
@dxfnyc Unfortunately we don't have access to that info. We're sorry for your disappointment.
@kennethpiner We like the contrast of the colors, but we love to know that you're flying with us one more time. Enjoy your flight.
@MattMadderra Have a wonderful flight and enjoy the game, Matt!
@HenryGraebe We've received your DM. Give us a few moments to take a look.
@BritishTraveler We look forward to seeing you in December, Steve! Have an awesome trip.
@coxeroo Our apologies for the confusion. We see you're away from the gate now and will be on your way soon.
@yareidde What happened? We want to turn that frown upside down. How can we help you?
@Travel_Buddha We know it's important to stay connected and are working on having power ports on all of our planes.
@TimWoodPulse We took a look at your reservation and would like to share some details. We'll be sending you a DM in a moment.
@RexReggie Please share further details with Customer Relations here: https://t.co/ShFB7JpoZL
@yareidde We're sorry the airport wasn't able to assist. Did you girlfriend get rebooked? She can contact us directly for help.

@alminana We don't like to hear this. Have you filed a report with Baggage Services?
@RRiddell3 We definitely don't want it to be your last. What happened?
@KatD717 We always want our agents to be happy. What's happened in LGA, Kat?
@KennyGibbsPhD We're glad you received our gift of some extra leg room! We hope you kick back, relax and enjoy the flight.
@taylorashtonp We know schedule changes can be frustrating. Reservations can look at all options for you. Please call 800-433-7300.
@sarcasticyogi We don't want to see you go. Please DM record locator and details. Your feedback is important to us.
@starflyergold We're always looking for ways to impress you. Making our customers happy makes us happy.
@oliver_oursin Are you checking in for a LAN flight or with us? Please follow and DM your record locator if we can assist you.
@Zboozee We're glad you arrived safe and sound. Thanks for hanging in there with us today.
@mzmcguire We're sorry that option doesn't work for you. Did you ask to speak to a supervisor to see if an exception can be made?
@OdileADurocher That's very unusual. Our flight crew is very polite. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
@Aero0729 The bags will always go to the final destination tagged. Unfortunately, they'll not be able to get their bags back for now.
@jvandermeer You can check out the music we play on our planes here: https://t.co/iTQFkNCgP1
@jordan_silver We're showing an estimated departure of 8:15p. You're safety is our top priority and they're working on the plane.
@Aero0729 We're sorry they're unable to receive their bags. Please have them contact us directly if they need further assistance.
@GoniMontes We're sorry you have that impression. If there's anything we can do to change your impression and assist you, let us know.
@MelanieNoelle1 It's always our pleasure to help! Thanks for your business and for flying Business with us.
@KylieEricaMar We want you to your destination as soon as possible, Kylie. We're sorry for the delay tonight.
@MuzikMyLife27 We look forward to seeing you on board tomorrow.
@gdeems We strive to always provide excellent customer service and we're disappointed to hear you feel otherwise.
@milexplorer If you're dissatisfied with the resolution provided, you're welcome to resubmit here for another look: https://t.co/ShFB7JH0ol
@Differcult It does state the upgrades are subject to capacity controls. Once they are gone, then waitlisting is an option.
@aus_ruth It was a pleasure having you, Austin!
@BillCampbelll That doesn't sound right. What was the reason given?
@GaryGnubian Safety is always and always will be our main priority. We'll take good care of your family.
@DomerFanKC We're sorry you missed your connection. Have you been rebooked?
@chica_2626 What's your flight number and how can we help today?
@ThufirHawat We're so glad you made it! Thanks for your patience, and for flying with us today.
@chica_2626 Oh no, are you ok? We're glad you made the flight.
